name: tempusdominus-core

scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm run build && ((npm run git-add-cm -- "Next patch version" 2>/dev/null) || echo) && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && npm run build && ((npm run git-add-cm -- "Next minor version" 2>/dev/null) || echo) && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && npm run build && ((npm run git-add-cm -- "Next major version" 2>/dev/null) || echo) && npm publish && git push && git push --tags

description: A date/time picker component designed for Momentjs.
